work.title: Stocks and Info
work.description: A project by Avonlea Haymart, Noah Neighbours, and Dominic Griffis. Main features include cryptocurrency, the ability to save stocks, and search functionality.

work.title: MongoDB News Scrapper
work.description: This website scrapes data from a car news website, and stores them into a database. It allows the user to save articles and add notes to them.

work.title: Drugs and Info
work.description: A basic medication website. It displays news articles, and enables the user to look up a medication to find information on it.
work.tech: OpenFDA and NYT API, Node.js, Express
